case.title: Two beautiful sisters 23,24 Hispanic looking for a date - 23 (NYC,NY)
case.text: Me and my sister are looking for someone to take us out for drinks and dinner tonight. Just want a night out. We are lightskin, slim, 5"3 5"4 . Best of all were both beautiful. Please contact ASAP because we would like to go out tonight. Preferably the sugar factory.
